SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser

Class CardJsonSerializerDebug

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.CardJsonSerializerDebug
public class CardJsonSerializerDebug extends Object
Class contains static methods to serialize Card->Json and to deserialize Json->Card Objects using the gson library with built-in logic to check for errors in the json.
  • SERIALIZATION: It is achieved with standard gson library methods.
  • DESERIALIZATION: By default, the gson parser does not check that the deserialized object matches class specifications because it bypasses the constructors for the class.
    This implementation makes use of support classes to enforce the usage of constructors in the following way:
    1. Gson is used to parse the input string and is deserialized into an instance of the support class.
    2. The support class contains the logic to check that the values read with gson do not break class specifications.
    3. If the check is successful, the support class creates and returns the object of the actual class using the appropriate constructors.

  • Method Details

    • serializeCard

      public static String serializeCard(Card card)
      Method serializes all polymorphisms of Card objects into Json strings using gson library.
      Parameters:
      card - Card object to be serialized.
      Returns:
      Json String of serialized card.

    • serializeCardList

      public static String serializeCardList(List<Card> cardList)
      Method serializes List of Card objects into Json strings of Cards separated by CARD_OVER keyword.
      Method uses serializeCard to serialize individual List entries and joins them using CARD_OVER as separator keyword.
      Parameters:
      cardList - List of cards to be serialized.
      Returns:
      Json String of serialized List.

      Returns:
      CardResource object Typecast to Card deserialized from input string.

    • deserializeCardResourceList

      public static List<Card> deserializeCardResourceList(String jsonString)
      Method splits provided string using CARD_OVER separator keyword and feeds the substrings to deserializeCardResource(). Then it puts the serialized cards into a Map and returns the map.
      Parameters:
      jsonString - String containing Json to deserialize.
      Returns:
      List containing Resource Cards deserialized from input string.

    • deserializeCardGoldenList

      public static List<Card> deserializeCardGoldenList(String jsonString)
      Method splits provided string using CARD_OVER separator keyword and feeds the substrings to deserializeCardGolden(). Then it puts the serialized cards into a Map and returns the map.
      Parameters:
      jsonString - String containing Json to deserialize.
      Returns:
      List containing Golden Cards deserialized from input string.

    • deserializeCardStarterList

      public static List<Card> deserializeCardStarterList(String jsonString)

      Parameters:
      jsonString - String containing Json to deserialize.
      Returns:
